criteria.name: Model Development Documentation
criteria.description_prompt: Please provide a high-level description on the model developer's documentation/submission
criteria.comments_prompt: Please provide your rationale on their documentation/submission if any.

criteria.name: Model Development Data
criteria.description_prompt: Please provide a high-level description of the potential model risk arising from modeling data.
criteria.comments_prompt: Please provide your rationale to support the assessment. If not applicable, provide the rationale.

criteria.name: Model Methodology, Assumptions and Simplifications
criteria.description_prompt: Please provide a high-level description of the model methodology, assumptions and simplifications submitted by the developer.
criteria.comments_prompt: Please provide your rationale to support the assessment. If not applicable, provide the rationale.

criteria.name: Model Inputs and Model Outputs
criteria.description_prompt: Please provide a high-level description on the model inputs and model outputs required by the model
criteria.comments_prompt: Please provide your rationale to support the assessment. If not applicable, provide the rationale.

criteria.name: Model Limitation and Model Risk
criteria.description_prompt: Please provide a high-level description on the model limitation and model risk identified by the Model Validator
criteria.comments_prompt: Please provide the model risk control and mitigation method if any

criteria.name: Benchmarking
criteria.description_prompt: Please provide a high-level description on the benchmark testing performed by the Model Validator
criteria.comments_prompt: For High and Medium inherent risk models, please provide the numerical test findings. If testing is not applicable, provide the rationale.
